products.title: Amor Antique Steel with Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Amor antique steel with haze pure double roller blind combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor antique steel and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy
products.productdescription: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked.
